wow, im suprised theres not more intelligent people here.. ok, if you replace the cracked exe in your crysis 2/bin32 folder with the stock exe, then it will update to 1.2. it does a crc32 check for the original file, unless its there it wont update. after you update to 1.2 then replace the exe with teh 1.1 and you can play online. you wont have any of the fixes from 1.2 but you will be able to play online.

Works fine !!!  

1. Mount the ISO
2. Copy Crysis2.exe from bin32 folder of ISO
3. Paste Crysis2.exe to C:\Program Files (x86)\Electronic Arts\Crytek\Crysis 2\bin32 folder and REPLACE !!

4. Click Crysis2Launcher.exe from ISO !! (This will update to v1.2 patch

5. Now Copy/Paste Crack'd Crysis2.exe to  C:\Program Files (x86)\Electronic Arts\Crytek\Crysis 2\bin32 folder and REPLACE !!

I just did it and it works fine using the original "FAKE" key/serial I have been using since day 1  ;)

 *REAL PROBLEM* Fucking is I got to the mission where you have to destroy that big ass mech alien thing, and "Rejoin Chino at Central Square" or whatever. However not a damn fucking thing happens. 

 I googled the issue and turns out it is a VERY common issue, even on consoles. I can't recall what version I have but it I just recently downloaded it. The FLT release. 

 A common suggestion was that people restart the mission. But they do and nothing happens. Just like myself I'd climb in the vehicle, stand in front of Chino, or quit and restart from the checkpoint. Same outcome.

 But I don't hear any of the same complaints on PB, so what gives. WHat's the big damn secret?
